Name: Hot Pebble
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Defense and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Torchic, Combusken, and Blaziken.  Swap a Torchic Hair and a Torchic Card for a Hot Pebble at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
